reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Enhancing Systems Towards Sustainable Universal Access

description.narrative: Eritrea - HIV - Ministry of Health of the State of Eritrea - MOH. This program has the following goals: To halt the transmission of HIV/STI infections nationwide. Improve the quality of life of people living with the disease. To contribute to attainment of health related SDGs. The objectives of this program are: Reduction of 50% in new infections among adults and children (Spectrum estimation 2016: from 451 in 2016 to less than 225 at the end of 2021). Reduction of 75% in AIDS related mortality (Spectrum estimation: From 439 in 2016 to less than 110 at the end of 2021)
